body.name: Kalorik MAXX® Digital 16-Quart Air Fryer Oven, 9-in-1 Countertop Toaster Oven and Air Fryer Combo, 21 Smart Presets, 9 Easy-to-Clean Accessories, 1600W, Stainless Steel, AFO 50932 OW

features: 9 APPLIANCES in 1 — Air fry, bake, toast, roast, grill, braise, sear, broil and dehydrate your favorite foods, all in one
ULTRA-FAST COOKING TIME — 1600W Turbo MAXX airflow cooks meals in a fraction of the time, saving you time and effort in the kitchen
EASY TO USE — LED display with intuitive digital controls feature adjustable time and temperature, plus 21 smart cooking presets that take the guesswork out of gourmet home cooking

MORE CRISP, LESS FAT — Indulge in your favorite fried foods, without the guilt! The MAXX captures the golden crunch and tender flavorful interior of deep fried food without the need for oil, reducing fat by up to 75% to make fried food healthy
500-Degree SEARING — 500°F of sizzling searing power achieves perfect caramelization on meat, fish, veggies, and more
9 GREAT ACCESSORIES — Dishwasher-safe accessories include: 2 air frying baskets, air rack, baking tray, crumb tray, rack handle, 2-in-1 dehydrator and steak tray, oven mitts, and silicone mat

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GOLDEN CARAMELIZATION Create a perfectly brown finish on your meat, fish, and vegetables, and prepare juicy, succulent steaks that sizzle, as the MAXX reaches up to 500°F, allowing you to achieve pan sear-style caramelization with restaurant-quality results. ULTRA-FAST COOKING TIME 1600W Power Turbo MAXX airflow cooks meals in a fraction of the time, saving you time and effort in the kitchen MORE CRISP, LESS FAT Indulge in your favorite fried foods, without the guilt! The MAXX captures the golden crunch and tender flavorful interior of deep fried food without the need for oil, reducing fat by up to 75% to make fried food healthy

FROM SOGGY TO CRISPY, FROZEN TO FRESH Skip the microwave. Reheat last night’s leftovers to restore their fresh taste and crispy texture, or cook frozen meals to perfection in minutes. INFINITE COOKING POSSIBILITIES, ONE SMALL COUNTERTOP FOOTPRINT Open up to a whole new world of culinary possibilities: the 16-Quart MAXX Air Fryer Oven features 9-in-1 functionality that can air fry, bake, toast, roast, grill, braise, sear, broil and dehydrate your favorite foods faster than ever, while achieving perfect, even-cooked results across the board. ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES FOR COOKING & BAKING Whether you’re in the mood for something savory, or you’re looking to satisfy a sweet tooth, the MAXX 16 Quart offers an endless variety of options for cooking and baking. Bake scrumptious crisp-crust personal pizzas, or make delicious pastries, cookies, cakes, and other desserts with the appliance’s OVEN function and baking accessories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the size, it's perfect for my small kitchen. The oven doesnt get hot to the touch. It's easy to use and well made. It comes with oven gloves, a hot handle, a silicon pad to avoid damage to your counter and a variety of cooking shelves. The only problem I'm having is I cant get the cooking time and temperature right. I keep burning food, im so used to my old decrepit counter oven taking forever. This oven is going to take some getting use to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My first airfryer
reviews.reviewText: I waited quite a while before I broke down and bought an air fryer. This air fryer met my expectations for a combination appliance. It bakes and toasts as well as air fry. One drawback is most recipes on line are for basket style fryers, so sometimes cooking adjustments have to be made. It also fits the space my old toaster oven/broiler took so no loss or change of counter footprint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How to fix the crumb tray
reviews.reviewText: I love the kalorik air fryer. The only problem I have with it is the weird material that the crumb tray is made out of. I found out too late that you should not put the crumb tray in the dishwasher. The finish started coming off. I was going to order another crumb tray or get the first crumb tray resurfaced or something but I realized what I should do. I put some olive oil on the crumb tray and rubbed 00 steel wool to clean the metal. It took the finish off down to the metal and shined it up a bit. Then I washed all the oil off and put it in the air fryer for about five minutes at 400°. Now it is shiny and perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally broke down last winter….
reviews.reviewText: …..and decided to see what all the fuss was over air frying….. it was a pleasant surprise to find out how good the food was, and SOOOO much healthier than frying ( but still getting crispy !👍). This appliance is fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Products that don't last long
reviews.reviewText: It's been a little over a year, but it's already broken and unusable. It wasn't too difficult to use, but I never expected it to break so quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I get the best of both worlds! I now have a oven and air fryer all in one! It is perfect for 2 people. I would suggest for a bigger family to get a bigger size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Amazon had 2 descriptions of this item.
reviews.reviewText: Amazon had 2 descriptions of this item. One in the main headline claiming that it's a 26 qt. air fryer and another one in the description saying it is a 16 qt. I ordered it thinking it was a 26 qt. fryer. Had to return it and order the right one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The moment I removed the plastic from the fryer, it was clear that this is a very cheaply made product, particularly for the price, and would not perform well or last (any many reviews already say so). I did not open anything further, packaged it back exactly as it came and sent it back. Since I did not use it at all, I have no feedback on other aspects.
Makes cooking that much easier. You can cook anything in it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Some of the best money I've ever spent!
reviews.reviewText: I've had my Kalorik Max for a couple of weeks and am thrilled with it's performance, ease of use and cleanup, and cooking perfection. The only thing I don't like is that I didn't get the 26 qt with rotisserie.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great cooking item to have.
reviews.reviewText: This was a present for my daughter, and she absolutely loves it. It cooks things great and at shorter cook times.
Easy to use, would buy again
